name: Access: Gun File Root
description:
Editing from the Roots!

You find a gun hidden in the woods, but something has awakened! Survive, while editing your gun through it's File Root. Unlock the power of the Root Gun.

Team Ant Inferno's first Jam together, a part of the 2 day jam: Global Game Jam 2023.

Good Luck with surviving!

Controls

WASD: To move.

E: To open the Root Menu.

Mouse: To aim.

Left Click: To shoot.

Right Click: To Dodge.

Credits

Art: https://matotam.itch.io/

Code: https://smos-bois.itch.io/
